articles.title: Tata Motors Ltd in demand - Business Standard
articles.description: Tata Motors Ltd is quoting at Rs 304.65, up 2.56% on the day as on 12:49 IST on the NSE. The stock is up 348.34% in last one year as compared to a 78.58% gain in NIFTY and a 112.46% gain in the Nifty Auto index.
